      • getAllLocation

        @GetMapping("")
public LocationResponse getAllLocation​(@RequestParam("page")
                                       java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> pageNumber,
                                       @RequestParam("pageSize")
                                       java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> pageSize,
                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Parameters:
        pageNumber - : number given by user of which page he/she wants to see,default page 1
        pageSize - : giving flexibility to user so can decide how much data will come to page, default size 20
        request -
        Returns:
        LocationResponse object that give results of given paramaters
